isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES FS-5106 AND FS-6206 - REASSEMBLE - MAINSHAFT

step1.para: Install mainshaft in vise equipped with wood or brass jaws, rear of mainshaft facing up ( Figure 82). Lubricate and install first gear bearings with spacer between bearings as shown.

figure.caption: Figure 82. Install First Gear Bearings

step1.para: Install mainshaft 1st gear, clutching teeth of gear facing down ( Figure 83).

figure.caption: Figure 83. Install Mainshaft 1st Gear

step1.para: Install reverse gear clutch hub with notched teeth facing down ( Figure 84).

figure.caption: Figure 84. Install Reverse Gear Clutch Hub

step1.para: Use a heat lamp or hot plate and oil to heat reverse gear bearing race and install on shaft with notched end facing down ( Figure 85). Race can also be installed using a sleeve type driver.

figure.caption: Figure 85. Install Reverse Gear Bearing Race

note.para: Do not heat reverse bearing race over 320°F (160°C).

step1.para: Install reverse gear sliding clutch with stepped shoulder down ( Figure 86).

figure.caption: Figure 86. Install Reverse Gear Sliding Clutch

step1.para: Lubricate and install reverse gear bearings on race ( Figure 87).

figure.caption: Figure 87. Install Reverse Gear Bearings

step1.para: Install reverse gear with clutching teeth facing down ( Figure 88).

figure.caption: Figure 88. Install Reverse Gear

step1.para: Install reverse gear washer ( Figure 89). Washer can be installed either way.

figure.caption: Figure 89. Install Reverse Gear Washer

step1.para: Use a sleeve type driver to install the rear mainshaft bearing as shown ( Figure 90).

figure.caption: Figure 90. Install Rear Mainshaft Bearing

step1.para: Reposition mainshaft in vise with the front of the mainshaft facing up ( Figure 91). Lubricate friction surface with transmission lube and install 1st-2nd speed synchronizer.

figure.caption: Figure 91. Reposition Mainshaft in Vise

step1.para: Lubricate and install 2nd gear bearings (inset, Figure 92). Install 2nd gear, clutching teeth facing down.

figure.caption: Figure 92. Install 2nd Gear Bearings and 2nd Gear

step1.para: Install locating ball and washer ( Figure 93). Washer can be installed either way. Install snap ring as shown (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 93. Install Locating Ball and Washer, and Snap Ring

step1.para: Lubricate and install 3rd gear bearings (inset, Figure 94). Install 3rd gear, clutching teeth facing up.

figure.caption: Figure 94. Install 3rd Gear Bearings and 3rd Gear

step1.para: Install 3rd-4th clutch hub with stepped face of hub facing up ( Figure 95). Install snap ring in groove of mainshaft (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 95. Install 3rd-4th Clutch Hub and Snap Ring

step1.para: Lubricate friction surface with transmission lube and install 3rd-4th speed synchronizer and 4th speed synchronizer cup ( Figure 96).

figure.caption: Figure 96. Install 3rd-4th Speed Synchronizer and 4th Speed Synchronizer Cup

step1.para: Lubricate and install 4th gear bearings (inset, Figure 97). Install 4th gear, clutching teeth facing down.

figure.caption: Figure 97. Install 4th Gear Bearings and 4th Gear

step1.para: Install locating ball and washer ( Figure 98). Washer can be installed either way. Install snap ring as shown (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 98. Install Locating Ball and Washer, and Snap Ring

step1.para: Lubricate and install 5th gear bearings (inset, Figure 99). Install 5th gear, clutching teeth facing up.

figure.caption: Figure 99. Install 5th Gear Bearings and 5th Gear

step1.para: Install 5th-6th clutch hub with flat surface facing up ( Figure 100).

figure.caption: Figure 100. Install 5th-6th Clutch Hub

step1.para: Install 5th speed synchronizer cup (inset, Figure 101). Lubricate friction surface with transmission lube and install 5th-6th speed synchronizer assembly and 6th speed synchronizer cup.

figure.caption: Figure 101. Install 5th Speed Synchronizer Cup, 5th-6th Speed Synchronizer Assembly, and 6th Speed Synchronizer Cup

step1.para: Use a sleeve type driver to install the front mainshaft bearing ( Figure 102). Install snap ring in groove on end of shaft (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 102. Install Front Mainshaft Bearing and Snap Ring

step1.para: Remove mainshaft assembly from vise and place on bench ( Figure 103). Shift synchronizer into 4th gear.

figure.caption: Figure 103. Shift Synchronizer into 4th Gear
